alert.note: Alert for Northern Carroll; Northern Coos; Southern Coos (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 02 at 3:28PM EST until December 04 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations greater than 8 inches possible. * WHERE...Portions of south central, west central, and western Maine and northern New Hampshire. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...East winds combined with the weight of snow on tree limbs may down power lines and could cause sporadic power outages. Periods of moderate and heavy snow will combine with low visibility to create dangerous driving conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday morning commute.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Northern Carroll; Northern Coos; Southern Coos
